author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve installation tips…I fasten a 2x10 to the studs and ensure it’s plumb. I normally like the valve to be 38 to 48 inches off the subfloor and centered on the shower drain. The final step is to see if the tile and backer board are flush with the front of the black plaster guard. For more shower valve tips and full step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #showervalve #bathroomremodel #showerremodel #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Valve Installation Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
